detail_desc: Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Long dress in an airy, patterned weave with a V-neck, butterfly sleeves, smocked seam under the bust, and slits in the sides. Jersey lining.
Leather belt with a metal buckle. Width 2.9 cm.
Knee-length shorts in cotton twill with pleats at the front and a zip fly and button. Side pockets and welt back pockets with a button.

Super push-up lace bra with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Slightly boxy jumper knitted in a soft, fluffy wool blend with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck, wrapover front with narrow ties at one side, long sleeves and a seam at the waist.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with crossover straps at the front and lightly padded, moulded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a lace trim at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit premium cotton with a collar, V-neck and slits in the sides.
Chinos in a slightly stretchy cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Side pockets, welt back pockets and gently tapered legs.
Lined, push-up triangle bikini top with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Shoulder straps that join and tie at the back.
Long-sleeved top in thin, printed cotton jersey with ribbed cuffs.

Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a button-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a sleeve placket with a link button. Rounded hem, slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in a textured knit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with round neckline and an opening and tie at the back of the neck. 3/4-length sleeves with a wide flounce at the cuffs, and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Jacquard-knit socks in various colours and designs.
Long jersey jumpsuit in a loose-fitting style with narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck, seam at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a chest pocket and welt front pockets with a flap. Buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Short, fitted, sleeveless dress in ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. Narrow cut at the top with a racer back.
Dress in printed, glittery tulle with an opening and button at the back of the neck and short, frilled sleeves. Lined.
Joggers in soft, washed denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake front pockets, a fake fly and elasticated hems.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a ribbed shaft and elastication around the top.
Shorts in stretch twill with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Bag in woven fabric with a wide, adjustable shoulder strap and two zipped compartments. Lined.
Shirt jacket in soft cotton corduroy with a collar, zip down the front and flap chest pockets with concealed press-studs. Long sleeves with plackets and buttoned cuffs.
Short nightslip in satin with a draped neckline at the front and V-neck at the back. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Long skirt in an airy weave with an elasticated waist and high slits in the sides. Short underskirt.
Short, straight-cut lace dress with a round neckline, concealed zip at the back, padded shoulders and long sleeves. Partly lined.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a wide panel at the top, side pockets and fold-down cuffs at the hems.
Short blouse in a viscose weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and a tie-front hem.
Tube scarf in a soft rib knit.
Jumper in a soft, loose knit with a V-neck, long raglan sleeves and roll edges at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline and small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long balloon sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs and decorative flounces front and back that start at the neck and extend down the sleeves. Straight-cut top section with a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a wide seam at the hem.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, decorative straps that cross at the back, and a string back.
Long-sleeved, fitted top in ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. Tape-trimmed V-neck front and back.
Jacket in washed denim with a hood and sleeves in jersey. Lined, drawstring hood, buttons down the front and a yoke. Flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets and ribbed cuffs. Unlined.

Jacket in soft fleece designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and long raglan sleeves. Unlined. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.
Slim-fit trousers in soft, stretch twill with a brushed finish. Zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and straight hems.
Scarf in a linen and viscose weave with raw, frayed edges on the short sides.
Hi-tops with an adjustable hook and loop tab, elasticated lacing, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Straight-cut top in woven fabric with a slight sheen, V-neck and spaghetti straps.
Double-layered jersey hairband with a knot-detail at the front.

Fitted, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with a brushed finish, peak lapels and an adjustable belt at the waist with a large covered buckle. Jetted front pockets, long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave made from a cotton blend with a regular waist, concealed zip in one side, fake welt back pockets and slim legs.
Fine-knit trainer socks in fast-drying functional fabric made from recycled polyester. Piqué section over the foot, elasticated tops and a slightly higher shaft at the heel for optimum comfort.
Fitted jumper in soft, rib-knit merino wool with a small stand-up collar and extra-long sleeves.
Short top in sturdy cotton jersey with long sleeves, a deep V-neck and buttons down the front.
Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with narrow, overlocked edges around the armholes and hem. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, a lined, wrapover hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Boxy-style top in lightweight organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Ribbed trim with a contrasting colour stripe around the neckline, and a drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Lined, non-wired bikini top with a sheen. Adjustable shoulder straps and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidery detail on the chest and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Shorts in soft cotton denim with broderie anglaise. Covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, a fake fly, side and back pockets, and scalloped hems.
Polo-neck jumper in fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Spacious paper straw shopper with two handles and a magnetic fastener at the top. Two inner compartments, one with a zip. Lined. Size 8x30x31 cm.
Small bag with a narrow shoulder strap and a zip at the top. Lined. Size 16x22 cm.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Poncho in woven fabric with fringes at the hem. Width 135 cm, length of back 78 cm.
Trousers in soft, patterned jersey with wide, elasticated smocking at the waist for a more comfortable fit. Side pockets, a low crotch and wide, tapered legs.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Fully lined bikini bottoms with an all-over print, low waist and high cut at the back.

Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend in a relaxed fit. Long raglan sleeves with contrasting colour stripes down the sides, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Blouse in woven fabric with inset lace trims, a small stand-up collar, a concealed zip at the back and a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the back of the neck. Long puff sleeves with wide lace buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Soft slippers in imitation suede with a fold-down shaft that has a hook and loop fastening at the back. Faux fur linings and insoles and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft jersey made from pima cotton containing some silk in a relaxed style with short slits in the sides.
Shirt in a cupro weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket in a narrow, straight style. Yoke at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Suit trousers in a textured linen and cotton weave with an adjustable elasticated waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Fitted, long-sleeved dress in sturdy crêpe jersey with a boat neck and a concealed zip at the hem that can be opened to create a slit. Unlined.
Round-necked T-shirts in organic cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey.
Sleeveless top in a rib knit with wide, rib-knit shoulder straps that join at the back.
Fitted top in stretch organic cotton jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
5-pocket low-rise jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and slightly wider, tapered legs.
Top in soft viscose jersey with a slight sheen and visible seams. Slightly wider neckline, short sleeves and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Short, A-line skirt in sturdy cotton twill. High waist with belt loops, patch front pockets with a flap, a zip at the back and short slits in the sides.
NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Round-necked T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey with a print motif, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Patterned swimsuit with a frill around the neckline that continues over the shoulder straps, and a decorative bow at the back.
